channel.title: [317]delta based-my npcdrops.cfg is not working at all. need some help
channel.description: my npcdrops.cfg is setup properly. i run my server and get a little error that pops up in the run.bat about npcdrops, then i login go kill a monster that i put in there that drops abby whips and it doesnt drop anything, like drops doesnt work at all, is there anything i have to do to add in other files for drops to work? this is a completely cleaned source.

item.title: [317]delta based-my npcdrops.cfg is not working at all. need some help
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“bowzer, post:15, topic:367931”]do you hoenstly want me to post my npcsdrops on here, fine i will.

//Slayer Tower //Rockslug npcdrop = 1622 995 10000 10 npcdrop = 1622 526 1 100 //Basilisk npcdrop = 1616 995 10000 10 npcdrop = 1616 526 1 100 //Infernal Mage npcdrop = 1643 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1643 995 20000 15 //Kurask npcdrop = 1608 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1608 995 25000 15 //Turoth npcdrop = 1626 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1626 995 20000 15 //Dustdevil npcdrop = 1624 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1624 995 50000 15 npcdrop = 1624 3140 1 1 //Gargoyle npcdrop = 1610 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1610 995 25000 15 npcdrop = 1610 4153 1 5 //Abyssal demon npcdrop = 1615 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1615 995 50000 15 npcdrop = 1615 4151 1 1 //Dark beast npcdrop = 2783 526 1 100 npcdrop = 2783 995 50000 15 npcdrop = 2783 4827 1 1 //Armadyl godwars npcdrop = 1000 35 1 1 npcdrop = 1000 7608 1 1 npcdrop = 1000 7609 1 1 npcdrop = 1000 7613 1 1 //Zamorak godwars npcdrop = 1702 746 1 1 npcdrop = 1702 7611 1 1 npcdrop = 1702 //Saradomin godwars spawn = 1105 2402 1 1 spawn = 1105 8100 1 1 //Bandos godwars spawn = 1115 667 1 1 spawn = 1115 1077 1 1 spawn = 1115 1107 1 1 //Defender mini spawn = 116 3096 1 40 spawn = 116 3097 1 35 spawn = 116 3098 1 30 spawn = 116 3099 1 25 spawn = 116 3100 1 20 spawn = 116 3101 1 5 [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]
now gl explaining whats wrong with it. cause theres nothing wrong with my npcdrops im telling you. i aint that fuckin dumb.[/quote]
cant find anything wrong with it… all looks nicely tabbed, might be a problem involving something connecting the .cfg file

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2274) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:590) at server.main(server.java:124) [/quote]

//abyssal demon npcdrop = 1615 4151 1 3 npcdrop = 1615 4587 1 3 npcdrop = 1615 1163 1 8 npcdrop = 1615 1079 1 5 npcdrop = 1615 2856 1 1 npcdrop = 1615 592 1 100

Find

Change that 45 to 300.
